vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Egyptians living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.18;
daughter of: Pharaoh (H6547M); married to Mered (H4778)(?);
mother of: Miriam (H4813H), Shammai (H8060I) and Ishbah (H3431)
§ Bithiah = "daughter of Jehovah"
a daughter of a Pharaoh and wife of Mered of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija del faraón; esposa de Méred, tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比提雅 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "雅巍的敬拜者"
法老的女兒, 猶大人米列的妻子(代上 4:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比提雅 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "雅巍的敬拜者"
法老的女儿, 犹大人米列的妻子(代上 4:17)
